description: Gets the SAS token associated with the specified Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage account and container combination.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextlink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

subscription_id.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the Azure storage account for which the SAS token is being requested.

container_name.description: The name of the Azure storage container for which the SAS token is being requested.
